lines.text: They say I came here together with those men, there, caught in the ice. Why I am alive and they are dead I don't know, and why the ice has formed in this parched desert is a mystery without an answer, but the little water that comes from it is vital to these people and they worship me, as a divine goddess.
We will need a lot more hemp before we're through.
Help me cut the choice meats.
Throw him off the cliff! Hurry! The gods must be appeased with fresh blood! Hurry!
Why is Yor different from other men?
I'm afraid death rules this land.
[tending the fire after Yor and Roa have gone off together]
I'll go look for them. The meat is burning.
It's your jealousy that's burning. Among our people, a man can have many wives, so why can't Yor have two?
